# addBarrier()

**Instance Method**

Encodes a barrier into the command buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
func addBarrier()
```

## Discussion

The method encodes a barrier that starts any subsequent commands only after all the previously encoded commands have completed.
title: addBarrier()
